query:
SELECT 
                id  as "id!",
                name as "name!",
                login as "login!",
                color as "color!",
                image as "image!",
                total as "total!",
                private as "private!",
                ranking as "ranking!",
                (
                    SELECT COUNT (*) 
                    FROM ranked_scores_view_per_channel
                    WHERE chatter_id = id
                ) as "total_scores!",
                created_at as "created_at!",
                updated_at as "updated_at!"
            FROM chatter_leaderboard
            ORDER BY ranking ASC
            LIMIT $1 OFFSET $2
